abstract: Stock markets finished lower as investors reacted to the shake-up at Citigroup, with the Dow Jones industrial average dropping 51.70 points by the close of trading.
snippet: Stock markets finished lower as investors reacted to the shake-up at Citigroup, with the Dow Jones industrial average dropping 51.70 points by the close of trading.
lead_paragraph: Stock markets declined today as financial companies stumbled in the aftermath of the shake-up at Citigroup.

abstract: Executives at Neutral Tandem may have been having some second thoughts on Thursday, when the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 362 points. The last thing that a company going public wants is a down market.
lead_paragraph: Executives at Neutral Tandem may have been having some second thoughts on Thursday, when the Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 362 points. The last thing that a company going public wants is a down market.

headline.main: Neutral Tandem Raises $78.6 Million Despite Choppy Market
